description:
Note: This plugin is now deprecated, and will not be updated. It has been rewritten entirely as Howler.js Pro plugin, which has extra features and bug fixes.

Play sound and music files and control them in your workflow. You can preload files to reduce loading times, set the playback rate and volume, and play, pause, stop and mute them in workflows.

Based on howler.js - an audio library for the modern web. Defaults to Web Audio API and falls back to HTML5 Audio. 

NOTE: Due to time constraints, my free plugins are no longer actively maintained and I cannot offer support. They are open source and pull requests are encouraged. If you're interested in sponsoring development you're welcome to contact me.
instructions: Add the element to your page and set the audio file to play in the plugin properties. You can now play, pause, etc the audio from within your workflows.
name: Howler (w/ Dynamic Volume)
plugin_instructions: Add the element to your page and set the audio file to play in the plugin properties. You can now play, pause, etc the audio from within your workflows.
